short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Counts the number of characters in the title and meta description tags on the current page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Counts the number of characters in the title and meta description tags on the current page and writes if it's too long or too short.
